#include<stdio.h>
#include "string.h"

void process(char *chuoi)
{
	int a=0;
	while(*chuoi)
	{
		a=(a*10)+(*chuoi-48);
		if((a>=65&&a<=90)||(a>=97&&a<=122)||a==32)
		{ printf("%c",a); a=0;}
		chuoi++;
	}
	printf("\n");

}

int main() {
	int tc;char chuoi[1024];
	scanf("%d",&tc);
	while(tc--)
	{
		scanf("%s",chuoi);
		process(chuoi);
	}


	return 0;

}
